articles.author: Hafsa Adil
articles.title: Who is Rachin Ravindra, New Zealand’s Cricket World Cup star?
articles.description: Ravindra’s story came full circle as his cricket-mad parents watched him make a World Cup 100 for New Zealand in India.
articles.content: Barely two hours into his first Cricket World Cup match, Rachin Ravindra was thrown into the limelight by the New Zealand captain and asked to bowl against the tournaments defending champions at the … [+3848 chars]

articles.title: 'I've got no confidence' - Can Broad play baseball?
articles.description: Watch ex-England cricketer Stuart Broad try his hand at baseball, with the help of MLB great Chase Utley, before the MLB Saturday Showdown live on the BBC.
articles.content:
Watch retired England cricketer Stuart Broad try his hand at baseball, with the help of MLB great Chase Utley, a six-time All-Star, before this weekend's MLB Saturday Showdown live on the BBC.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
